Text:
Several days have elapsed since Cid lost a portion of
his memory...

I still can't remember anything about you guys,
this place, or this organization.

Hmm... Well, there's no rush, Cid. You're still you,
after all.

The one who says this is today's caretaker, Zeta.
She efficiently attends to his needs.
...Alright, done. Anything else you'd like?

Thanks. Not at the moment... Though I would like to
leave this room soon.

That's not solely up to me. But I'll relay your
message.

I don't think staying in this room will help me
recover my memories.

In fact, I still don't have a clue what kind of
person I was, even though it seems I had
connections with all of you.
Not even a clue?
No, not really.

You may be a far more incredible person than you
think, Cid.
Huh?

As Cid blinks in surprise, Zeta silently approaches,
her tail gently brushing him.

At the very least, you're someone incredibly dear
to me...

...Although, Cid, I'm only saying this because you
don't have your memory right now.

Blushing slightly, Zeta playfully rubs her tail
against him.
I-I see...

(She seems to be complimenting me, but I can't
concentrate on what she's saying... What's with
the way she's acting...?)
Just as Cid is about to ask—
BOSS MAAAAAAN!!!
The room's door bursts off its hinges.
Hey, kitty cat! What're you doing here?!
(I'm pretty sure this is the girl called Delta.)

What're you doing in Boss man's room?! It's my turn
to take care of him today!
You were late. I already finished up long ago.
Whaaaat?! Don't take my job! That's stealing!

I step in to do your job for you, and this is the
thanks I get?

I'm guessing since you didn't show up, you must've
forgotten it was your turn, didn't you?

Ngh... I-I might've taken a nap...but I didn't
forget!

Anyway, kitty cat! Stop that tail thing! Don't mark
Boss man with your scent!
(Ah, was that tail movement a way of marking me?)

Since I did a certain someone's job for them,
I'm just leaving my mark as proof.

You...! Now I'm pissed off! You're not getting away
with this!
Jeez, what an impulsive dumb dog.

A physical fight between Delta and Zeta breaks out
inside the room with the door blown off. Cid takes
cover under the bed.

(...What the heck? They're going all out and
destroying everything indoors... Huh?)

Suddenly sensing someone's presence, he glances
toward the entrance to see a girl radiating an
intimidating aura.
What do you think you two are doing?
Delta?
Ulp...
Zeta?

Their fight, violent enough to wreck the room,
ceases instantly.

(Picking massive fights, getting dragged into them...
Stopping fights with words and intimidation... This
place might actually be pretty dangerous...)
A few days later...

With the room Cid was confined in destroyed, he is
given permission to freely roam the organization's
building.

(There are still areas off-limits to me, but this
feels much healthier than being unable to move
around.)

(Within the areas I'm allowed to roam, I need to
gather as much information as possible about this
organization and myself...)
...Heh...heheheh...

(Hm? I thought I heard something... Was it coming
from that room?)

Peeking stealthily into the room where the eerie
voice emanates from, Cid notices it's filled with
suspicious chemicals and equipment.
(Is this...a lab? It's a total mess...)
(And isn't that girl...Eta?)
Hehehehe... It's ready...!

Once I administer this...heh heh heh...! The plan
will be set in motion...after tomorrow's dinner...
under the guise of looking after him...!

(Looking after him... Wait, is she talking about me?!
Is she planning on drugging me?!)

Even if the drug fails...I'll replicate the head
trauma that caused his memory loss...or I'll
employ Shadow Wisdom...to drop a lightning
bolt on him...

(This is bad... She's gonna use me as...a human test
subject!)

Witnessing the mad scientist's mumblings and sinister
laughter, Cid quickly retreats from the door and
hurries away.

As Cid flees the lab, in his distress, he rounds the
corner and nearly runs into a young girl walking
in the other direction.
Eeek!
Oops, sorry... You're Gamma, right?

Master Cid?! I-I'm so sorry! I wasn't paying
attention and didn't see you there...

D-Don't worry about it. I wasn't really paying
attention, either.

But I'm glad I ran into you here. I've actually been
looking for you.

Your head injury should be on the mend by now. We'd
need Alpha's permission, but how about a change of
scenery? Fancy a trip to town?

Having accepted Gamma's invitation, Cid is led into
town by her.

(I was blindfolded until we reached town, probably to
conceal sensitive information... It's clear I'm being
kept in some secret organization.)

I never imagined we'd be strolling through town
together again so soon, Master Cid. I guess I should
thank Delta and Zeta for wrecking your room.

Does anything feel familiar? The drifting scents,
the sounds around us... Nothing ring a bell?

Um, you know... Walking through town like this, just
the two of us, it kinda feels like we're...lovers or
something. W-Wait... Why did I just say that?!

(Two individuals capable of wreaking havoc on a room,
and a scientist attempting to conduct experiments on
me...)

(And then there's that woman who seems to be in
charge, radiating that totally intimidating aura...)

(This secret organization is highly dangerous. Why
was I ever involved with these people before losing
my memory? But...this ends here!)

Wh-What if we...you know, actually became lovers...?
Wait, Master Cid?

Ooh! That music sounds kinda familiar! It's coming
from over there!

Shouting a blatant lie, Cid dashes off as quickly as
a startled rabbit.
Wha—?! H-Hold on, wait... Eek!
(She tripped?! But now's my chance!)
Pl-Please, wait! Master Cid?! Cid!!!

Cid runs desperately, the echoes of Gamma's voice
ringing hollow throughout the town...
